The image is a black-and-white illustration depicting a scene from 'Alice's Adventures in Wonderland.' It features Alice standing between two fantastical creatures: the Gryphon on her left and the Mock Turtle on her right. The Gryphon, a mythical beast with the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle, stands on its hind legs with its front paws raised, appearing to be in mid-conversation or dance. The Mock Turtle, a creature with the body of a turtle and the head of a calf, stands upright on its hind legs, also seemingly engaged in conversation or dance. Alice is dressed in a typical Victorian-era dress, with a calm and curious expression on her face. She appears to be interacting with the creatures, possibly participating in their dance. The background shows a rocky landscape with sparse vegetation, suggesting an outdoor setting. The overall atmosphere is whimsical and surreal, capturing the fantastical nature of the story.
A young girl with long hair, wearing a dress, standing between two mythical creatures.
A mythical creature with the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle, standing to the right of Alice.
A mythical creature that resembles a hybrid of a turtle and a calf, standing to the left of Alice.

image_3.description: The image is a black-and-white illustration of the White Rabbit from Lewis Carroll's 'Alice in Wonderland.' The rabbit is depicted standing upright, dressed in a formal outfit that includes a coat adorned with heart patterns. The coat has large buttons and a prominent bow tie. The rabbit holds a trumpet in one hand and a parchment-scroll in the other. The rabbit's expression appears hurried or anxious, as indicated by its wide eyes and slightly open mouth. The background is minimalistic, with no additional details, focusing attention on the rabbit's actions and attire. The overall atmosphere conveyed is one of urgency and formality, fitting the character's role in the story.

The White Rabbit is holding the trumpet in one hand.
The White Rabbit is holding the scroll in the other hand.

image_4.description: The image is a black-and-white illustration of the Mad Hatter from Lewis Carroll's 'Alice in Wonderland.' The Mad Hatter is depicted wearing a large, tall top hat with the label 'In this style 10/6' written on it. He is dressed in a checkered outfit consisting of a jacket, vest, and pants, all featuring a pattern of squares. The Mad Hatter has a peculiar posture, with his body slightly bent forward and his head turned to the side, giving him a whimsical and eccentric appearance. His face is partially obscured by the brim of his hat, adding to his mysterious and chaotic demeanor. He is holding a piece of bread in one hand, which he appears to be examining closely. The background is minimalistic, with simple lines suggesting a ground or floor, and there are no other objects or characters present. The overall atmosphere conveyed by the image is one of absurdity and madness, fitting the character's reputation in the story.
A whimsical character from Alice in Wonderland, characterized by his tall hat with a band reading '10/6', and his eccentric clothing including a checkered coat and mismatched shoes.
The Mad Hatter is wearing a tall hat with a band reading '10/6'. This hat is a distinctive feature of the character.
The Mad Hatter is dressed in a checkered coat and mismatched shoes, which are part of his eccentric appearance.

image_7.description: The image is a black-and-white illustration depicting a scene from 'Alice in Wonderland.' It features the King of Hearts, who is seated on a throne and reading from a scroll. The King is dressed in regal attire with a crown adorned with hearts and a long beard. He has a surprised or confused expression on his face. In front of him, there is a table with a plate of tarts, which are heart-shaped. To the left of the King, there is a small figure, possibly the Knave of Hearts, who is standing and looking up at the King. The Knave appears to be made entirely of cardboard, as indicated by the context. The background includes various heart motifs, adding to the whimsical and fantastical atmosphere of the scene. The overall mood conveyed is one of confusion and absurdity, typical of the narrative style of 'Alice in Wonderland.'

The positions suggest a strategic game setup where both sides have key pieces in play, ready for potential moves.

The image is a black-and-white illustration depicting a whimsical scene from Lewis Carroll's 'Through the Looking-Glass'. The central figure is Alice, who stands in the middle of the scene, observing various chess pieces that are anthropomorphized and appear to be walking about. On the left side, there is a large White King with a crown, holding a scepter, and next to him is a White Queen, both dressed in elaborate robes. To the right, there is a Red King and a Red Queen, also dressed in regal attire. In front of them, two castle pieces are depicted as human figures, walking arm in arm. The background shows a room with a fireplace, where some of the chess pieces have fallen into the hearth among the cinders. The image is a black-and-white illustration depicting a scene inside a train carriage. On the left, there is a man wearing a conical hat and a white outfit, who appears to be reading a newspaper. Outside the window, a guard is seen through a telescope, binoculars, and an opera glass, peering into the carriage. The guard is wearing a tall hat and a coat. The background shows the interior of the train carriage with windows and curtains. The overall atmosphere is whimsical and surreal, capturing a moment of curiosity and observation among the characters.
